column4: is there a gnome application that allows me to connect rempotly to other boxes graphically?
do i need to apt-get it?
does the remote machine need to have VNC as well?
on the machine you want to connect to, go to System - Preferences - Remote Desktop and do the right settings. Then use Applications - Internet - Terminal server client to connect
the other box is in another country ,can do the settings thru command line?
i don't know that. Probably there is a way
